name: 新叶旅者与少年的回忆
name_original: 新叶旅者与少年的回忆
description:
Game Mode

Simulated business RPG

Running a tavern, earning money, upgrading a tavern, unlocking recipes,

Invite companions to take an adventure! Experience turn based battles, enhance relationships with your favorite characters, and date together!


Game Introduction

In order to pay off the debt owed by his father, Gu Mi, a young man who aspires to become a top chef, became the owner of the Lin Jian Tavern!

Gu Mi knew in his heart that running a tavern in such a remote place would definitely not be an easy task! But in order to pay off the debt, he can only persevere.

In the process of running a tavern, Gu Mi met many young people with vastly different personalities,

And in the process of interacting with teenagers, they understand each other and have gone through many experiences together,

And perhaps they have developed a feeling of surpassing each other's friends

In the end, will he be able to pay off all his debts, and with whom will he embark on a surprising love story?

Character
